settings.promo_subtext: Use the code below and save instantly at checkout.

settings.description_content: Our patented open ear design and integrated liquid silicone molding mean the OWS Pro rests gently on top of your ear, never intruding. Comfort all day, every day.

settings.heading: All-Day Comfort, All-Day Stable
settings.description: Our patented open ear design and integrated liquid silicone molding mean the OWS Pro rests gently on top of your ear, never intruding. Stays put, and you'll forget you're even wearing them.

settings.heading: Stay Connected to Your World
settings.description: With our entirely open-ear design, the OWS Pro keeps you in sync with your surroundings. Enjoy your audio without sealing off the sounds of nature or your environment.

settings.heading: A Powerful Surge of Sound
settings.description: Our patented Virtual Bass 2nd algorithm uses high dynamic power to enhance low-frequency sound quality, significantly improving bass volume for a fuller, deeper audio experience.

settings.heading: 58 Hours of Uninterrupted Power
settings.description: Our self-developed 150mAh 'Little Steel Cannon' battery offers high density and stronger charge storage, giving you up to 58 hours of full battery life with the charging case.

settings.title: Engineered for Sound and Comfort
settings.subtitle: Discover the innovative technology that makes OWS Pro the ultimate open-ear headphone.

settings.quote: I'm a runner and these are a game-changer. I can hear traffic and still enjoy my podcasts. Super comfortable and they never fall out.
settings.author: Sarah L.

settings.quote: The battery life is insane. I use them for work calls all day and barely have to charge them. The sound quality for music is surprisingly rich too!
settings.author: Mike T.

settings.quote: Finally, headphones that don't hurt my ears! The open-ear design is brilliant. I can wear them for hours without any discomfort.
settings.author: Jessica P.

settings.title: Join Thousands of Happy Ears
settings.subtitle: See what our customers are saying about the Oladance OWS Pro.

settings.heading: Charge It Up
settings.description: Use the included Type-C cable to fully charge your OWS Pro in the portable case.

settings.heading: Pair in Seconds
settings.description: Open the case and your OWS Pro will automatically enter pairing mode. Connect via Bluetooth on your device.

settings.heading: Wear and Go
settings.description: Gently place the headphones over your ears and enjoy crystal-clear audio while staying aware of your surroundings.

settings.title: Ready in a Flash
settings.subtitle: Getting started with your OWS Pro is as simple as one, two, three.

settings.spec_value: Skin-friendly silicone, titanium memory steel wire
